title: Login Issue: An unexpected error occurred while logging in
body:
Have gone to login like any other day and am receiving an error saying "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists contact support at support.riotgames.com". Nothing has changed on my end and it's happening with multiple accounts. Isn't an incorrect password as it tells me if I enter it incorrectly.

Anyone experiencing the same thing or have any ideas?

replies.body: Yeah ever since the forced client update I haven't been able to log in. Found nothing helpful so far.

Can you try the solutions provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article? Let me know how it goes!
i have the same problem guys,any solutions ??
hey  how fix pls help me , an unexpected error has occurred while logging in league of legends ????????????????

> [{quoted}](name=Oshii,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=FURnGmvG,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-04-13T07:49:48.118+0000)
>
> Have gone to login like any other day and am receiving an error saying "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists contact support at support.riotgames.com". Nothing has changed on my end and it's happening with multiple accounts. Isn't an incorrect password as it tells me if I enter it incorrectly.
> 
> Anyone experiencing the same thing or have any ideas?
I still met this problem today and already mad for that, who can help me? I have done everything you give.{{summoner:3}}

Hello, I know this topic is kind of outdated, but maybe I can still help a few people. I posted my solution in the page below, the link sends you too an other League of Legends forum.

(https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/E0OHAd21-cant-connect-play-or-patch-without-the-use-vpn?show=nested&comment=0005)

I hope it also worked for you.

See you on the rift
- Zerpheriora -
gus please help i hate it !!!! i want to play ?!! guys !? the same iusse and no body in riot did something to fix it ?! now i have the same problem and my friends too ?! so help us ?! can u ?!
I'm having the same problem
Worked for me: Just right click League of legends launcher and then click Troubleshoot Compatibility, select Try Recommended settings, Test the program, Then next and save the new settings
I'm having the same problem... Did this then worked for a bit and now has gone back to the unexpected error again. reinstalling and patching doesn't help either...

Can you try the solutions provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article? Let me know how it goes!
why will so many players try troubleshooting. This issue is not new. Riot should have come up with solution in the new patch . Every player can not be so technically good .
I Have The Same Problem Pls Riot I Need Help I Didnt Play For 5 Days :(
Have the same problem please help anyone :(

I was playing games then suddenly my fsp was getting weird. so i restarted my pc after the game then it asked me to patch up for the new client. after the new patch it took me almost 10 minutes to log in, and i can't even play games. Profile page is glitched and won't appear- you can't que for any games.

.... ;;;

You may need to repair your client. Click on the cog in the top-right hand corner of the client, and select Initialize Client Repair. If the problem persists, let me know and we can try alternative solutions.

Same problem from 4 days ago.... I tried with differente account and reinstalled the entire game, but no working yet !!!!
all others online game are fine.
PLS HELP SOON

Can you try the solutions provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article? Let me know how it goes!
i am also having this issue
This may have been due to a scheduled maintenance for your server around this time. Are you still having login issues?
I have this same issue, any solutions for you guys?
This may have been due to a scheduled maintenance for your server around this time. Are you still having login issues?
I don't understand , i'm putting in my login details properly but it keeps popping up with "An unexpected error has occurred while logging in".....what should i do?!!....
Oh and i do have my region setting put in correctly..

Can you try the solutions provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article? Let me know how it goes!
Apologies for the late response; are you still encountering login issues with the client?

Hey there,

Are you sure you have the correct region selected at the login screen?

Definitely had the correct region selected. It would give me an error about the wrong username or password if I didn't.

The issue seems to have been fixed now as I'm able to login fine, seems like others are having a different issue now though.

i know how to fix this error. it works for me. 
go to https://www.hotspotshield.com/ and download it and it will fix this error.
Share this with to help more players!
